metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18310 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in dwfl_segment_report_module.c in libdwfl in elfutils through v0.174. The vulnerability allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by consider_notes.

criterions.comment: elfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
